title: Judge Napolitano on Rudy Giuliani Subpoena: What Was Rudy Tasked With Doing? That’s The Big Question.
text:
Subpoenas flying in the battle over impeachment, House Democrats now demanding President Trump's personal attorney, Rudy Giuliani, hand over documents about Ukraine. This is the latest move from Democrats as they move full speed ahead, tee up a potential impeachment vote by the end of the year. Meantime, President Trump hammering the whistleblower and says the White House is trying to figure out who it is.

Guy gets reaction from Judge Andrew Napolitano -- Fox News Senior Judicial Analyst & Host of the new Fox Nation show "Liberty File

Listen Below:
